paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant V122I, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The V122I variant of the TTR protein is being increasingly recognized as an underdiagnosed cause of heart failure in elderly African American patients, 3–4% of which appear to carry the gene.

functional_data.summary: The V122I variant is associated with increased fibrillogenicity leading to amyloid deposition.

variants.additional_notes: The variant is particularly noted in the context of heart failure in older populations.
key_quotes: The V122I variant of the TTR protein is being increasingly recognized as an underdiagnosed cause of heart failure in elderly African American patients.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward with clear information on the TTR variant.
